synopsis.text: This anniversary film offers a fresh take on the origins of the Dragon Ball story. It recounts the iconic first meeting between Goku, Bulma, and Master Roshi, as fate brings together these soon-to-be steadfast companions. Their quest for the mythical Dragon Balls also crosses paths with the nefarious Red Ribbon Army, who pursue the wish-granting orbs for their own ambitions, even if it means eliminating Goku and friends who stand in the way. With stunning GT-style animation befitting its 10th anniversary celebration, this film promises to captivate fans both new and old. Viewers can delight in revisiting Goku's beginnings with a new twist, while also being introduced to the larger-than-life characters and thrilling adventures that have made Dragon Ball a beloved franchise across generations. Whether you're a longtime fan eager to rediscover where it all started, or newcomer seeking an accessible entrypoint into the iconic shonen series, this film delivers an experience sure to fuel the fires of fantasy and excitement.
